definition: (bound form) crass/stupid/rude/(used to represent the sounds of "ru", "lu" etc in loanwords)
surname Lu/Lu, ancient state of China 魯國|鲁国[Lu3 guo2]/Lu, short name for Shandong 山東|山东[Shan1 dong1]
thick weeds/luxuriant growth/Illicium anisatum, a shrub with poisonous leaves/impertinent

sentences.english: He was also a reckless adventurer who got lucky.
sentences.chinese: 同時他也是一位輕率魯莽而運氣十足的冒險家。

sentences.english: Natives will cringe and squirm with embarrassment at such brashness.
sentences.chinese: 對於這種輕率魯莽，當地人會因尷尬而戰戰兢兢。

sentences.english: A typical quick temper, and work is rash, almost not pass through the brain.
sentences.chinese: 一個典型的急性子，做事也很魯莽，幾乎不經過大腦。

sentences.english: The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment."
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

sentences.english: " Someone who drives recklessly is called a ma lu sha shou, meaning "road killer.
sentences.chinese: 那些開車魯莽的人被稱之爲“馬路殺手”。

sentences.english: Jaywalking is an informal term commonly used in North America to refer to illegal or reckless pedestrian crossing of a roadway.
sentences.chinese: 通常在北美用來指非法或魯莽的行人過路。

sentences.english: " The left-leaning La Repubblica said it was a "reckless comment.
sentences.chinese: 左翼的《共和報》稱這是“魯莽的言論”。

sentences.english: Now a prig is a pert fellow who gives himself airs of superior wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 這種人魯莽無禮，總是擺出一幅有極高智商的神態。

sentences.english: China says the quota cuts will prevent reckless and polluting mining of deposits.
sentences.chinese: 中國政府稱配額削減是爲了避免魯莽的開採積存污染。

sentences.english: Iceland was ruined not by its own recklessness but by a global tsunami.
sentences.chinese: 愛爾蘭不但毀於它自己的魯莽而且毀於全球海嘯。

sentences.english: Their abruptness and improbability made us sick .
sentences.chinese: 他們的魯莽和不講道德令我們噁心。

sentences.english: But the banks inside the Circle of Death were more reckless than most.
sentences.chinese: 但是死亡之圈的銀行家卻比大多數人更加魯莽。

sentences.english: Quick wafting zephyrs vex bold Jim.
sentences.chinese: 急速狂吹的西風激怒了魯莽的吉姆。

sentences.english: He didn't like it that one of the several citations he received was for reckless driving.
sentences.chinese: 有一份書面材料認爲他是在魯莽駕駛。

sentences.english: RECKLESS】Two children were killed by a reckless driver.
sentences.chinese: 兩個孩子被魯莽的司機撞死。

sentences.english: This is routinely used to block any demonstration that citizens have the temerity to propose.
sentences.chinese: 這個程序是慣有的組織公民魯莽提議的範例。

definition: wording/way of expressing something/turn of phrase/diction
